body.name: 24-Piece Black Silverware Set with Steak Knives, Black Flatware Set for 4, Food-Grade Stainless Steel Tableware Cutlery Set, Mirror Finished Utensil Sets for Home Restaurant
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 52 mins
features: PREMIUM 24-PIECE BLACK SILVERWARE SET FOR 4: This flatware set contains 4 dinner forks, 4 salad forks, 4 dinner spoons, 4 dessert spoons, 4 dinner knives and 4 steak knives. It’s the ideal set for home daily use, and also for restaurants, pubs, cafes, and hotels. This cutlery set also help your dinner full of design while having a party.

4 STEAK KNIVES INCLUDED: 4 additional steak knives are offered in this pack that are also made of stainless steel with sharp serrations on the blades help it easy to cut meat, and being ideal to use for eating. The triple riveting handle is strong and durable even when cut hard, and the ergonomic design makes it very comfortable to hold.
USE AND MAINTENANCE: Recommend hand wash first, storage them after drying. Wire brush, hard sponge, cleaning cloth or any other hard material are not recommend , it will damage the silver.

COMFORTABLE DESIGN: This flatware set has a classic silhouette with clean lines and polish-finish surface in all black, a good choice to go with your existing tableware. The smooth edge of the handle is pleasure to hold, appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use.

HIGH-QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL: Made of premium food-grade stainless steel, providing the longest term value and the best properties, it offers nice resistance to rust and corrosion to get the most sturdy and healthy experience while using, never bend in daily use.
body.description: LUXURY BLACK SILVERWARE Satin black makes it looks more retro, creating an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere, elevating everyday meals into a fine dining experience. USING INSTRUCTION: 1. Please wash the silverware set with warm soapy water before first using to wash off any processing residue left from manufacturing. 2. Please clean the silverware set after using and dry the pieces for their durability.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UNIQUE MODERN BLACK FLATWARE SET WITH METALLIC LOOK, MAKE YOUR TABLE SETTING ELEGANT AND DIFFERENT EWFEN 24-Piece Great Value Flatware Set is made of the premium 18/0 stainless steel will not bend, break, or get damaged by heat. This elegant silverware set would elevate your everyday meals into a fine dining experience.

LUXURY BLACK SILVERWARE Satin black makes it looks more retro, creating an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere, elevating everyday meals into a fine dining experience. USING INSTRUCTION: 1. Please wash the silverware set with warm soapy water before first using to wash off any processing residue left from manufacturing. 2. Please clean the silverware set after using and dry the pieces for their durability. 24 PIECES CUTLERY SET, SERVICE FOR 4 Black Dinner Knife x 4 Black Dinner Fork x 4 Black Dinner Spoon x 4 Black Salad Fork x 4 Black Tea Spoon x 4 Steak Knife x 4

Proper gauge thickness and weight, sleek curved edges ensure the utmost comfort. The handles, in particular, provide a natural, balanced feel in hand. Ergonomic design for comfortable grip by both adults and children. In this pack comes with 4 steak knives, no need to purchase another meat knives to fit in the existing silverware set. Sharp serrated blades of the steak knives can easily cut and slice various steaks and other meats. No complicated handle decoration, elegant and simple designis favored by most people, match any style of your dinnerware or tableware set. Highly reflective finishing increase taste of your everyday meals
We are committed to provide unique style and premium quality tableware set to customers. Hope you have a good dining experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish Dining Essential!
reviews.reviewText: Product: 24-Piece Black Silverware Set with Steak Knives, Flatware Set for 4**30+ Day Review**Summary: An elegant and durable silverware set that elevates dining experiences.Pros:- Smooth edges ensure safety- Ideal weight for flatware handling- Sharp and robust knives- Partially serrated butter knives for practicality- Appropriately sized utensils with an adult feel, avoiding the “kid-sized” issue of some budget sets- Uniform and elegant appearance- Excellent resistance to stains and discoloration after prolonged use- Remarkable quality at an astonishing price pointCons:- Unable to identify any drawbacks, as this product excels in all aspectsRecommendation: A huge thumbs up! This silverware set embodies quality, style, and value, making it a must-have for any household.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most beautiful silverware set
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely gorgeous. I have always wanted a black set of silverware and these are very good quality, heavy silverware. The value for the price is fantastic!Can't say enough good things about them. If you are on the fence, give them a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great flatware set
reviews.reviewText: GREAT FLATWARE SETPerfect every day flatware set.Classy and not fancy at the same time.Black fades a bit after washing however it is a non-issue for me.Great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set is beautiful and aesthetically pleasing! The only I reason I’m leaving 1 star is because water stains stay on behind after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, all I can really say is wow. This silverware set is by far the sleekest, sexiest i’ve seen in my whole 33 years of existence lol. They feel good, they look good, they’re sturdy, you have your big ones and you have your small ones and the knives are to die for they’re so cheek, absolutely love this set I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ya get your money's worth
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and has a nice heft to them. Hand wash for best results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Dorm/College Apartment
reviews.reviewText: This silverware was purchased for my son’s apartment at college. Good value and durable product. He really likes the sleek color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024

reviews.reviewText: This Black Silverware is so cool looking on the dinner table.Extreamly well made and super easy to clean.We love them!Thank you!
